About the Company: Veljan Denison Ltd is an industrial manufacturer and services hydraulic fluid power systems and components.The company produces hydraulic pumps and motors including vane pumps and motors, piston pumps and motors, and radial piston motors; electronic components, HydraCOOL system, and OASIS system; valves and manifolds.The products find applications in mobile equipment and machinery used in the construction, demolition, mining, utilities, agricultural, industrial manufacturing industries and marine equipment used in commercial and military sea vessels.

registrars.name: Venture Capital & Corporate Investments Pvt. Ltd.
